mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_reports WHERE status = '대기'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rooms_reports WHERE status = 'PENDING'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM host WHERE is_verified = '검증 중'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users_roles WHERE role_id = 2
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS book_count FROM books WHERE start_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MONTH) AND NOW() GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(paid_at, '%Y-%m') AS month, SUM(amount) AS revenue FROM payments WHERE paid_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MONTH) AND NOW() AND status = '결제 완료' GROUP BY month ORDER BY month;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE DATE(created_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) FROM payments WHERE status = '결제 완료'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_reports WHERE status = '대기'

SELECT u.user_id, u.email AS user_email, r.room_id, r.name AS room_name, r.address, r.price FROM rooms_reports rr JOIN rooms r ON rr.room_id = r.room_id JOIN users u ON r.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY rr.report_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM books WHERE status IN ('이용자 취소', '숙박업자 취소')
SELECT u.user_id AS id, u.email, u.phone_number AS phoneNumber FROM users u JOIN users_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role = 'ROLE_ADMIN';
SELECT c.name AS categoryName, COUNT(rc.room_id) AS roomCount FROM categories c LEFT JOIN rooms_categories rc ON c.category_id = rc.category_id GROUP BY c.category_id ORDER BY roomCount DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT o.name AS optionName, COUNT(rro.room_id) AS roomCount FROM room_options o LEFT JOIN rooms_room_options rro ON o.option_id = rro.option_id GROUP BY o.option_id ORDER BY roomCount DESC;
